positive_examples: This is an example of abrasive powder.
The abrasive powder demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed abrasive powder in this context.
A typical case of abrasive powder would involve these features.
The concept of abrasive powder applies here.
Fine abrasive particles used for polishing, grinding, and surface finishing operations.
negative_examples: This is an example of fallout, not abrasive powder.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Fallout, or other types of Powder

definition: Finely ground hard material used for grinding, polishing, or surface finishing.
